Welcome to Ecoforecast Africa, the African chapter of the [Ecological Forecasting Initiative](https://ecoforecast.org/). This site serves as a hub for ecological forecasting in Africa, providing tools, resources, and a community for researchers, practitioners, and enthusiasts interested in ecological forecasting.

Please [**JOIN US**](https://forms.gle/8TFEigaaWoJPGXPe8) to receive updates on our activities and events.
